name: L1S4
description:
L1S4 is having a bad dream. Help it get to the Spinning Core
Use the 3 Command blocks to guide it.

ControlsLeft Mouse ButtonDrag and Drop Command blocksRight Mouse ButtonDestroy Command blocks

Created for TriJam 78 in 2 hours and 55 mins. 
Theme: Robots also dream

(My first attempt at using Godot)
